txt.en: Although it once served as a camp of the Ungoledain, Kêr Bréin has fallen to the Frost-horde. There, the cold-drakes of Ered Mithrin lay their eggs within its ruined walls.\n\nYour mission is to destroy cold-drake eggs at Kêr Bréin.
Within the ruined walls of Kêr Bréin, the cold-drakes of the Frost-horde have laid a new clutch of eggs.
You have completed your mission.\n\nYou should talk to Hórin for your reward.

'I have a new mission for you, [placeholder].

'My scouts have returned from Kêr Bréin. In addition to being used as a base of attack against our forces in Ered Mithrin, the cold-drakes of the Frost-horde have transformed Kêr Bréin into a crude nursery for a new clutch of their eggs. Unless these eggs are destroyed, we shall soon have to contend with an even greater threat... and greater numbers of dragon-kind!

'You are to travel to Kêr Bréin and destroy the eggs of the Frost-horde. For the Zhélruka! For the Gabil'akkâ!'
Monsters in this mission will attempt to summon allies to the fight.
Your mission is to destroy cold-drake eggs at Kêr Bréin.\n\nYou should talk to Hórin and travel to Kêr Bréin.
'It is done?\n\n'Wonderful! If the Frost-horde cannot bolster their numbers, our victory is assured!'
